label: IceArrow_PictureBook
text: An arrow imbued with the power of ice. It breaks apart on impact, freezing objects in the immediate area. It's incredibly effective against hot things.

label: BombArrow_A_PictureBook
text: A powerful arrow designed to destroy monsters. The explosive powder packed into the tip ignites on impact, dealing massive damage to anything caught in the blast.

label: AncientArrow_Desc
text: An arrow created using ancient technology. To be struck with one is to be consigned to oblivion in an instant. It deals devastating damage—even against Guardians.

label: FireArrow_PictureBook
text: An arrow imbued with the power of fire. It breaks apart on impact, igniting objects in the immediate area. It's incredibly effective against cold things.

label: IceArrow_Desc
text: An arrow imbued with the power of ice. It breaks apart on impact, freezing objects in the immediate area. It's incredibly effective against hot things.

label: AncientArrow_Spec
text: The ancient arrowhead deals massive damage.

label: AncientArrow_PictureBook
text: An arrow created using ancient technology. To be struck with one is to be consigned to oblivion in an instant. It deals devastating damage—even against Guardians.

label: NormalArrow_PictureBook
text: A common arrow. Its shaft was carved from the wood of a sturdy tree.

label: ElectricArrow_PictureBook
text: An arrow imbued with the power of electricity. It breaks apart on impact, channeling electricity into nearby objects. It's incredibly effective against metal or anything wet.

label: BombArrow_A_Desc
text: A powerful arrow designed to destroy monsters. The explosive powder packed into the tip ignites on impact, dealing massive damage to anything caught in the blast.
